verses.roman:
pūrva-dina-prāya vipra karila randhana
taiche anna-kūṭa gopāla karila bhojana

synonyms: pūrva-dina-prāya—almost like the previous day; vipra—all the brāhmaṇas; karila—did; randhana—cooking; taiche—similarly; anna-kūṭa—heaps of food; gopāla—the Deity of Lord Gopāla; karila—did; bhojana—eating.
translation: The next day, almost like before, there was an Annakūṭa ceremony. All the brāhmaṇas prepared foods and Gopāla accepted them.
